title: Build video frame extractor
description: Create module to load video files and extract frames at configurable intervals using OpenCV. Should support seeking to specific timestamps and iterating through frames.

title: Install dependencies and verify setup
description: Install the package in dev mode, verify tesseract is available, and confirm opencv/pytesseract work

title: Build game state aggregator
description: Combine outputs from all detection modules into a unified GameState object representing: current street, cards visible, pot size, player stacks, current action, etc.

title: Build chip/money OCR module
description: Extract chip counts and bet amounts from the game UI using OCR. Need to identify regions where amounts are displayed and parse the numeric values.

title: Gather sample frames from Governor of Poker gameplay
description: Record or capture sample frames showing different game states: hole cards, community cards, betting rounds, chip stacks, player actions. These will be used for developing and testing detection algorithms.

title: Build player action detector
description: Detect player actions: fold, check, call, raise, all-in. May involve detecting UI elements, button highlights, or text recognition.

title: Build card detection module
description: Detect and recognize playing cards (rank and suit) from frame regions. Need to handle hole cards and community cards. Consider template matching or ML-based approach.

title: Set up Python project structure for Governor of Poker video analysis
Build hand history exporter
description: Export detected game states to standard hand history format (PokerStars format or similar) for use with poker analysis tools.

title: Build table region detector
description: Identify key regions of the poker table UI: player positions, community card area, pot display, dealer button position. This provides coordinates for other detection modules.
